body:
Adding new package kaks-calculator. 

> Is there an upstream bug report?

Kind of. The creator evidently knows about this problem, according to the webpage where I found the fix on: https://www.researchgate.net/post/Can_someone_help_me_with_a_problem_about_KaKs_calculator20_used_in_linux_systems

> I contacted the author and he suggested me to 
add the following line at the beginning of file "base.h"
#include <string.h>
title: kaks-calculator: new package
